relapse: I'm falling back into your arms again, no escape, no pretend.
memories: All these memories keep flooding back, can't let go, it's just like that.
lost in time: Drifting away, lost in time, echoes of you still on my mind.
broken promises: All the words you said, they fade away, broken promises still replay.
forever yours: No matter where we go, I'm forever yours, through highs and lows.
